Don\'t be scared… Mark as paid Mark as unpaid No Delete Restore Cancel Edit Pay Pay selected debts Add a new debt All changes are successfully synced. Something went wrong. :\"( Log out Refresh Do you want to delete this debt? Yes Exit Do you really want to close this app? No internet connection available. You don\"t have any debts! (ง ͠° ͟ل͜ ͡°)ง No one owes you any money. Or do they? (¬_¬) You will find any changes that affect your debts here. Hey, here you can see your friends and settle up all of their debts at once. Neat, isn\"t it? You Editable only by me Created at: Total: This field can\"t be empty. This field has to be a number. This number is too big. Sorry, you can\"t owe someone 0 money. :-) My debts Their debts Action feed Friends synced not synced Partial payment
A new debt was created. Debt was marked as paid. Debt was marked as unpaid. Debt was deleted. Debt was restored. Name of the friend was changed. Amount was changed. Currency was changed. Owed subject was changed from money to a thing. Owed subject was changed from a thing to money. Name of owed thing was changed. Note was changed. Creditor and debtor were switched. Permission to edit this debt was changed.\
I\'m sorry, this version of the app is too old and needs an update to work. Please go to Google Play and update. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cz.petrkubes.payuback Login with Facebook so it\'s easier to share debts with your friends. ;-)
